revision.comment: Added Links of Interest section with a Link to a Reverse Engineering page for this router
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gemtek |model=WVRTM-127ACN |fcc_date=11/20/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, CPE |fcc_id=MXF-WVRTM127ACN |ic_id=3069B-WVRTM127ACN |pwr_v=56 |pwr_amp=0.54 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1708-AMTH, CTPSCV56, DTPGAC78; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81LA-25T |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M14D1G1664A-2.5B |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7612EN;MEDIATEK, MT7612EN, 1710-BMAL, ETPCCH97; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7603EN;MEDIATEK, MT7603EN, 1715-BMJL, DTPCNW14; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags=VoIP, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Telrad2.4G_XXXXXX, Telrad5G_XXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|Indoor WiFi Router}} :[http://www.telrad.com/products/ Product page]
"WVRTM-127ACN_V02", "19K-513-8500R RoHS" and "1717" :are silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/MXF-WVRTM127ACN/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3640955 FCC photos].
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/digiampietro/hacking-gemtek ''WVRTM-127ACN Reverse Engineering Project''] for the router distributed in Italy by Linkem, includes router's pictures, UART position, default WiFi password recovery, how to get root access and firmware modification kit
